Content: A smith technique before the Lament is used, giving the blade a relatively light usability with its cumbersome-looking body.
A sword of recognized blessing since it accompanies multiple fighters' triumphs.
A gun known for its strong firepower. Impassioned convictions will rise when this gun is held on the battlefield.
A pair of sound gauntlets with a brutal weight and ultimate reliability. It can unleash huge power enough to move mountains in the hands of proficient users.
Carrying relatively advanced matrix chain technology, it shall make perfect operations masterpieces worthy of appreciation.
